overview: On the brink of taking it to the next level with her boyfriend, Victoria comes home to find a mysterious box on her kitchen table. In it are the remains of an ancient powerful skull known only as The Eye of Menw. Menw's power is the knowledge of the future for those who are pure-hearted. But when Victoria asks about her future, she unleashes an unholy abomination from hell.
tagline: For those who seek out the dark eye.
title: The Eye of Menw
